categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rollo was a male Human Captain of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was stationed on Balmorra, where he was send by Major Bessiker to assist a Sith in apprehending a defector scientist Iannos Tyrek.
Captain Rollo appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Balmorra.
